author: Erik Lorincz
description: His aperitif-style cocktail has subtle smoky peatiness with herbal complexity provided by Bénédictine and Byrrh.
name: Smoke and Mirrors #1
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into mixing glass, SMOKE (with applewood smoke), then STIR with ice and strain into chilled glass
